amendment.description: An amendment numbered 142 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit the Department of Education from using funds to implement, administer, or enforce a provision of their Oct. 31 final rule that would prohibit education and training programs from exceeding their state's minimum hours requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smucker amendment (A083) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smucker amendment (A083) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smucker amendment (A083) Agreed to by voice vote.
